user_input: Create a Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany (DE00) with a capacity of 1000 MW. Clone the Nuclear SMR in Nuclear
author: Dante
default_llm_context: The joule model is used to simiulate the EU energy mix at a PAN_EU level. It considers the electricity, hydrogen and gas sectors and the interlinkages therewithin.

tasks.description: Create a Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany (DE00) with a capacity of 1000 MW. Clone the Nuclear SMR in Nuclear.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Clone the Gas category in generators, add a new category called Gas Expansion and add a suffix _expansion to each object', select the appropriate PLEXOS category for cloning.
